Titles.FreeCircumventHUD: This token can circumvent the next lock, click to remove
Titles.addIdentityMessage: Player {pPlayerName} wants to add these identities to a lock:{pIdentities}

Popup.Lockoutofreach: This lock is out of reach

LockPicksuccess.crit: {pName} critically succeeded at picking the lock

LockPickfail.crit: {pName} critically failed at picking the lock

LockPicksuccessLPName.crit: {pName} critically succeeded at picking the lock with {pLPName}
LockPicksuccessLPName.default: {pName} succeeded at picking the lock with {pLPName}

LockPickfailLPName.crit: {pName} critically failed at picking the lock with {pLPName}
LockPickfailLPName.default: {pName} failed at picking the lock with {pLPName}

LockPickfailLPNameremove.crit: {pName} critically failed at picking the lock and broke {pLPName}

LockBreaksuccess.crit: {pName} critically succeeded at breaking the lock

LockBreakfail.crit: {pName} critically failed to break the lock

ChatMessage.PickPocketDetailed: {pName} tried to pick pocket {pTargetName} with a DC of {pDC}:

useGMquickKeys.name: Use GM quick controls
useGMquickKeys.descrp: Allows the GM to use the special lock related controls listed at the bottom (affected marked with *)

allowTileLocking.name: Allow Tile locking
allowTileLocking.descrp: Allows for tiles to be lockable objects

allowLocking.name: Allow player locking
allowLocking.descrp: Allow players to lock locks if they have a matching key

startasLocked.name: Start as locked
startasLocked.descrp: If newly registered locks start locked

LockDistance.name: Lock distance
LockDistance.descrp: Distance over which a lock can be used (in in-game units)

DefaultLockSound.name: Default lock sound
DefaultLockSound.descrp: The default sound applied to new doors a lock tokens

UseArmReachDistance.name: Use "Arms Reach" distance
UseArmReachDistance.descrp: Uses the distance set in the "Arms Reach" for the lock distance

alwaysopenOwned.name: Always open owned
alwaysopenOwned.descrp: Players can always open owned tokens, even if they are locked

allowallInteractions.name: Allow all interactions
allowallInteractions.descrp: If all interactions (pick, break, custom, pickpocket) should be allows even for impossible DCs

showinteractionDCs.name: Show interaction DCs
showinteractionDCs.descrp: If the interaction DCs should be shown in the interaction menu

showallLockInteractions.name: Show all lock interactions
showallLockInteractions.descrp: Always show all interaction options for locks (for the evil GM in you)

preventUseinPause.name: Prevent key use while paused
preventUseinPause.descrp: Prevent players from using keys while the game is paused

useKeyDialogbydefault.name: Use Key select dialog by default
useKeyDialogbydefault.descrp: If all lock key uses should require a key selection by default

autoKeyuse.name: Automatic key use
autoKeyuse.descrp: Players will automatically try to use a matching key if they interact with a locked object

KeyItemtype.name: Type of key items
KeyItemtype.descrp: The type of item the module will use for new keys, leave empty to use default type (you can get a list of valid types by typing "game.items.documentClass.TYPES" into the F12 console)

LnKSettingTypes.name: Setting item types
LnKSettingTypes.descrp: The item types for which the Lock & Key settings are displayed (seperated with ";", "all" for all types)

LnKSettingsubTypes.name: Setting item subtypes
LnKSettingsubTypes.descrp: The item subtypes for which the Lock & Key settings are displayed (seperated with ";", "all" for all subtypes)

KeyitemCreationPopup.name: Key creation menu
KeyitemCreationPopup.descrp: If a menu should be shown for newly generated key to change their name and folder

KeyitemCreationIDOption.name: Key creation id option
KeyitemCreationIDOption.descrp: If an option to enter a custom key id should be displayed in the key creation menu

DefaultKeyFolder.name: Default key folder
DefaultKeyFolder.descrp: The name of the default folders used in the key creation menu

LimitKeyFolders.name: Filter key folders
LimitKeyFolders.descrp: If only the default key folder and its subfolders should be shown in the key creation menu

UseKeynameasID.name: Key name as ID
UseKeynameasID.descrp: If a keys name should be considered as an additional ID for the purpose of opening locks

usePf2eSystem.name: Use system rolls
usePf2eSystem.descrp: Use the systems roll rules (disables Lock & Key custom roll formulas and crit settings in favor of the systems rolls rules)

CritMethod.name: Crit system
CritMethod.descrp: The way critical rolls are determined

options.d10poolCoD2e: d10 pool >=8 and reroll on 10 [e.g. CoD2e]

LockPickItem.name: Lockpick items
LockPickItem.descrp: Names or compendium IDs (recommended) of a lockpicking items, "-" if no item is necessary (seperated with ";")

MentionLockPickItem.name: Mention lockpick item
MentionLockPickItem.descrp: If the used lockpick item should be mentioned in the chat

RemoveLP.name: Remove Lockpick
RemoveLP.descrp: If and under which conditions the used Lock pick item is removed

RemoveLPoncritFail.name: Remove Lockpick on critical fail
RemoveLPoncritFail.descrp: If the used Lockpick is removed on a critical fail (or if the stack is reduced by 1)

JamLockonLPcritFail.name: Jam lock on critical lockpick fail
JamLockonLPcritFail.descrp: Doors are jammed on critical lockpick fails and cant be picked anymore

JamedLockKeyunusable.name: Keys can't be used on jammed locks
JamedLockKeyunusable.descrp: Jammed locks will no longer accept matching keys

defaultLPAttempts.name: Default Lock pick attempts
defaultLPAttempts.descrp: The default amount of Lock pick attempts before the lock becomes unpickable (-1 for unlimited attempts)

autoResetAttempts.name: Auto reset lock pick attempts
autoResetAttempts.descrp: When the lock pick attempts should be reset

LockPickFormula.name: Lockpick roll formula
LockPickFormula.descrp: The formula which is used for dice rolls when picking a lock (e.g. "1d20 + @actor.skills.thievery.mod", help can be found on the Github page of this module)

DefaultPickDC.name: Default lock DC
DefaultPickDC.descrp: The default value for lock DCs

LockBreakFormula.name: Break lock roll formula
LockBreakFormula.descrp: The formula which is used for dice rolls when breaking a lock (e.g. "1d20 + @actor.skills.athletics.mod - 2", help can be found on the Github page of this module)

DefaultBreakDC.name: Default lock break DC
DefaultBreakDC.descrp: The default value for lock break DCs

CustomCircumventName.name: Custom check name
CustomCircumventName.descrp: The name of the third optional custom check to circumvent locks (e.g. "Hacking" or "Magic rune", leave empty to deactivate)

CustomCircumventFormula.name: Custom check formula
CustomCircumventFormula.descrp: The formula which is used for dice rolls when using the custom check above

CustomCircumventDefaultDC.name: Custom check default DC
CustomCircumventDefaultDC.descrp: The default value for custom check DCs

LockBreakunlockable.name: Make broken locks unlockable
LockBreakunlockable.descrp: Makes lock that have been broken unlockable

onlyCombatMultiSuccess.name: Multi-success during combat only
onlyCombatMultiSuccess.descrp: Ignores set required Lockpicking successes outside of combat

LockCircumventName.name: Lock circumvention keywords
LockCircumventName.descrp: Keywords to identify effects (e.g. the "Knock" spell) that allow players to circumvent locks (seperated with ";")

AutoAcceptIdentityAddition.name: Automatically accept identity additions
AutoAcceptIdentityAddition.descrp: If identity addtions should be accepted automatically (not recommended)

EnablePickpocketing.name: Enable Pickpocketing
EnablePickpocketing.descrp: Enables the Pick pocket feature and its settings

PickPocketFormula.name: Pick pocket formula
PickPocketFormula.descrp: The formula which is used for dice rolls when pick pocketing (e.g. "1d20 + @actor.skills.thievery.mod", help can be found on the Github page of this module)

PickPocketDefaultDC.name: Pick pocket default DC
PickPocketDefaultDC.descrp: The default value for pick pocket DCs

PickPocketDefaultDCFormula.name: Pick pocket default DC formula
PickPocketDefaultDCFormula.descrp: The default formula used to calculate the Pick Pocket DC (overrides other defaults)

PickPocketDefaultItemDC.name: Default Item Pick pocket DC
PickPocketDefaultItemDC.descrp: The default Pick pocket DC modifier for items

PickPocketDCCritThreshold.name: Pick pocket crit DC threshold
PickPocketDCCritThreshold.descrp: Maximum SG for pick pocketing that can be overcome by critical successes

AutoUpdatePickPocketDC.name: Auto update Pick Pocket DC
AutoUpdatePickPocketDC.descrp: If the Pick Pocket DC should get automatically updated when a perception check is rolled

PickPocketItemTypes.name: Pick pocketable item types
PickPocketItemTypes.descrp: Item types that can be pick pocketed (seperated with ";", "#currency" for numerical currency)

MaximumPPNumber.name: Maximum Item for Pick pocket
MaximumPPNumber.descrp: The maximum number of Items a user can take when successfully pick pocketing a token (-1 for unlimited)

MaximumPPNumberCrit.name: Maximum Item for critical Pick pocket
MaximumPPNumberCrit.descrp: The maximum number of Items a user can take when critically pick pocketing a token (-1 for unlimited)

MaximumPPNumberFail.name: Maximum Item for failed Pick pocket
MaximumPPNumberFail.descrp: The maximum number of Items a user can take when failing to pick pocket a token (if the Item DC still allows for it, -1 for unlimited)

MaximumPPWeight.name: Maximum Item weight for Pick pocket
MaximumPPWeight.descrp: The maximum weight (system units) of Items a user can take when successfully pick pocketing a token (-1 for unlimited)

MaximumPPWeightCrit.name: Maximum Item weight for critical Pick pocket
MaximumPPWeightCrit.descrp: The maximum weight (system units) of Items a user can take when critically pick pocketing a token (-1 for unlimited)

MaximumPPWeightFail.name: Maximum Item weight for failed Pick pocket
MaximumPPWeightFail.descrp: The maximum weight (system units) of Items a user can take when failing to pick pocket a token (if the Item DC still allows for it, -1 for unlimited)

PickPocketCooldown.name: Pick pocket cooldown
PickPocketCooldown.descrp: Pick pocket cooldown per player in seconds

deadActorsLootable.name: Dead tokens lootable
deadActorsLootable.descrp: If dead token should be lootable/pick pocketable without roll

lootFilter.name: Loot filter
lootFilter.descrp: If only items in a bag or container item called "Loot" should be pick pocketable (only supported for some systems)

MentionPickpocketDetails.name: Mention Pick Pocket details
MentionPickpocketDetails.descrp: If the target name and the DC should be mentioned in the Pick Pocket message

PerceptionKeyWord.name: Perception key-word
PerceptionKeyWord.descrp: Key word to recognise perception rolls (a string present in the flavour text of perception rolls)

ControlSceme.name: Control sceme
ControlSceme.descrp: Sceme used for the play controls (right-click+keys is described in more detail below under "Player controls"

MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
MessagePopUps.descrp: Enables multible popups upon actions such locking or unlocking a lock

PlayLockSounds.name: Play lock sounds
PlayLockSounds.descrp: Play a sound when a lock is locked/unlocked

FreeCircumventButtonPosition.name: Lock circumvention indicator position
FreeCircumventButtonPosition.descrp: The position of the indicator that shows that a token can circumvent the next lock on the token HUD

dblClicktoLoot.name: Double click to pick pocket
dblClicktoLoot.descrp: If double clicking a token should trigger pick pocketing

CustomCheck.name: Custom Check (ask GM (unless you are the GM))

OpenImageFlag.name: Open Image
OpenImageFlag.descrp: Image used for the open state

ClosedImageFlag.name: Closed Image
ClosedImageFlag.descrp: Image used for the closed state

LockonCloseFlag.name: Lock on close
LockonCloseFlag.descrp: If this door should be locked once it is closed

descrp.lock: IDs which can lock/unlock this lock (seperated with ";", "&" for multiple required keys)
descrp.key: IDs which this key can lock/unlock (seperated with ";")

UseKeyDialogFlag.name: Key use dialog
UseKeyDialogFlag.descrp: If the user has to choose which key to use

PasskeysFlag.name: Passwords
PasskeysFlag.descrp: Passwords that can unlock this lock (seperated with ";")

PasskeyChangeableFlag.name: Password changeable
PasskeyChangeableFlag.descrp: If the password can be changed by players (requires correct password)

IdentityKeyFlag.name: Identities
IdentityKeyFlag.descrp: Identities that can unlock this lock (seperated with ";", IDs/Names of Token/Actor/User)

LockjammedFlag.name: Jammed
LockjammedFlag.descrp: If this lock is jammed (see world settings)

RemoveKeyonUseFlag.name: Remove key on use
RemoveKeyonUseFlag.descrp: If this key is removed on use (or the stack is reduced by one)

LockDCFlag.name: Lock DC
LockDCFlag.descrp: The difficulty class of this Lock, used for lockpicking (-1 to prevent lockpicking)

SpecialLPFlag.name: Special lockpick
SpecialLPFlag.descrp: Special lockpick required to pick this lock (ID or name, multiple entries seperated with ";")

LockBreakDCFlag.name: Lock break DC
LockBreakDCFlag.descrp: The difficulty class to break this lock (-1 to prevent breaking)

LockCCDCFlag.name: {pCheckName} DC
LockCCDCFlag.descrp: The difficulty class to use {pCheckName} on this lock (-1 to prevent)

requiredLPsuccessFlag.name: Required Lockpicking successes
requiredLPsuccessFlag.descrp: How many Lockpicking successes are required for this lock (and how many have already been added) (crits count as 2)

LPAttemptsFlag.name: Lockpicking attempts left
LPAttemptsFlag.descrp: How many Lockpicking attempts are left (-1 for unlimited)

canbeCircumventedFreeFlag.name: Can be circumvented
canbeCircumventedFreeFlag.descrp: If this lock can be circumvented by effects (e.g. the spell "Knock")

CustomPopupsFlag.Title: Custom Popups
CustomPopupsFlag.name: Set custom Popups for certain player interactions:

LocknotCustom.name: Lock can't be used with custom check:

SoundVariantFlag.name: Lock Sound
SoundVariantFlag.descrp: Set the sound set used for actions with this door

descrp.token: The formula added to Lockpick rolls this token makes
descrp.item: The formula added to Lockpick rolls the owner of this item makes (only best in inventory used)

descrp.token: If this tokens Lockpick formula overrides the world formula
descrp.item: If this items Lockpick formula overrides the tokens/worlds formula

descrp.token: The formula added to Breack lock rolls this token makes
descrp.item: The formula added to Breack lock rolls the owner of this item makes (only best in inventory used)

descrp.token: If this tokens Break lock formula overrides the world formula
descrp.item: If this items Break lock formula overrides the tokens/worlds formula

descrp.token: The formula added to {pCheckName} rolls this token makes
descrp.item: The formula added to {pCheckName} rolls the owner of this item makes (only best in inventory used)

descrp.token: If this tokens {pCheckName} formula overrides the world formula
descrp.item: If this items {pCheckName} formula overrides the tokens/worlds formula

descrp.token: The formula added to Pick pocket rolls this token makes
descrp.item: The formula added to Pick pocket rolls the owner of this item makes (only best in inventory used)

descrp.token: If this tokens Pick pocket formula overrides the world formula
descrp.item: If this items Pick pocket formula overrides the tokens/worlds formula

LootFormulaFlag.name: Custom loot formula
LootFormulaFlag.descrp: Replacement for pick pocket formula when pick pocketing this token

PickPocketDCFlag.name: Pick pocket DC
PickPocketDCFlag.descrp: The difficulty class to use Pick pocket this character (-1 for impossible)

item.name: Pick pocket DC mod
item.descrp: Modifier when pick pocketing this item

ReplacementItemFlag.name: Replacement Items
ReplacementItemFlag.descrp: Items that get consumed instead of this item when a roll fails (ID or name, multiple entries seperated with ";")

MATTTriggerTileFlag.name: Triggered tile ID
MATTTriggerTileFlag.descrp: The ID of the tile triggered by the Lock & Key actions below (you may use different landings)

d10CritLimit.name: Lockpick d10 crit limit
d10CritLimit.descrp: The minimum crit value for d10 lockpick rolls

d10CritLimit.name: Lock break d10 crit limit
d10CritLimit.descrp: The minimum crit value for d10 lock break rolls

GMControls.line1: •shift+right-click to create a new key for the lock
GMControls.line3: •ctrl+right-click to copy the locks key IDs (*)
GMControls.line4: •ctrl+left-click to paste key IDs into the lock (*)

PlayerControls.line1: •right-click to try to use a key on a lock
PlayerControls.line2: •shift+right-click to try to pick a lock
PlayerControls.line3: •alt+right-click to try to break a lock

loot-inventory.name: Loot inventory
loot-inventory.descrp: {pname} of {pEntities}, offer to {pOfferto}
